betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The crusher doubles your ore output.  The days are over when you had to crush your ores by hand with a hammer.  Now you can let a machine do the work and even get double the output!

The crusher will need 16 KU/t to crush ores into crushed ores.  A Bronze engine will provide the KU but you will need 2 Bronze Boilers to get enough steam to get the engine past 16KU/t.  This will put the bronze engine at the very top of its range so the engine will turn red.  Just do not supply more than 96 steam/t to the engine, thus no more than 2 bronze boilers.  You can use a single steel boiler as it only puts out 64 steam/tick.  There are other options, you will just have to do some math.
Â§a
To complete the quest craft:
1 Bronze Crusher
